metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9085 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple integer overflows in libwebp allows attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9085` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwebp6 - 0.6.1-2
libwebpdemux2 - 0.6.1-2
libwebpmux3 - 0.6.1-2
webp - 0.6.1-2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> issue is in file in examples directory, only used to build the gif2webp tool in the webp binary package in universe.

criterions.comment: libwebp package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2').
